markdownRemark.html:
console.log("Hello World")

I’m not really good at writing. Need to improve :D

In this blog I will try to document things that I’m learning (mostly front end related).

I’ve got an inspiration for public learning from Tania Rascia.

The idea of building blog with Gatsby came from overreacted.io. I was really impressed by ability to generate pages with .md files. Also I was impressed that anyone can modify/translate it via pull request on github.

frontmatter.title: First post and Blog reasoning
frontmatter.description: Testing post plus some thoughts about starting a blog
